pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a street corner featuring two vending machines, one red and one white, with various drinks displayed. Several bicycles are parked next to the vending machines, and a 'no parking' sign is visible on a pole. The camera gradually moves forward, revealing more of the street and the surrounding buildings, including a silver car parked on the right side of the road. The camera continues to move forward, focusing on the 'no parking' sign and the parked bicycles, while the background shows residential buildings and a crosswalk.
